text: ラッキー! / カジさんにショッピングを付き合ってもらえるなんて! / な、なんだ? / ここ水着コーナーじゃないか! / ねえねえ、これなんかどう?
translation: Lucky! I can't believe I get to go shopping with Kaji-san! / Wh-what? / This is the swimsuit section! / Hey, hey, how about this one?

vocabulary.meaning: to accompany, to go along with

grammar: てもらえる - receiving a favor (potential form); なんて - expresses surprise or disbelief; じゃないか - masculine confirmation particle

text: いや、はや、中学生にはちょっと早すぎるんじゃないかな
translation: Well, uh, isn't that a bit too advanced for a middle school student?
grammar: 〜には - as for/for; すぎる - excessive degree; んじゃないかな - tentative negative suggestion (masculine)

text: カジさん、遅れてる! / 今時こんくらい、あったりまえよ! / ほう、そうなんだ
translation: Kaji-san, you're behind the times! / Nowadays this much is totally normal! / Oh, is that so?

vocabulary.meaning: to be behind, to be late

grammar: 〜てる - contracted form of ている (continuing state); こんくらい - colloquial for このくらい (this much)

text: せっかくの修学旅行だもん / パーッと気分を解放しなきゃ / 修学旅行どこ?
translation: It's a special school trip after all / I've got to totally let loose! / Where's the school trip?
grammar: せっかくの - emphasizes something is special/precious; だもん - casual explanatory tone (feminine); しなきゃ - contracted form of しなければ (must do)

text: 沖縄! / メニューにはね、スクーバーダイビングも入ってんの / スクーバね
translation: Okinawa! / The itinerary even includes scuba diving / Scuba, huh
grammar: には - particle combination for emphasis; 入ってんの - contracted form of 入っているの (is included)

text: そんやもう3年も潜ってないな / ねえ、カジさんは修学旅行どこ行ったの?
translation: Wow, I haven't dived in 3 years / Hey, where did you go for your school trip, Kaji-san?
grammar: も - emphasis particle (as many as); 〜てない - contracted negative of ている (haven't been doing); な - masculine sentence-ending particle

text: ああ、俺たちそんなのなかったんだ / どうして?
translation: Ah, we didn't have anything like that / Why not?
grammar: 俺たち - we (masculine); なかったんだ - explanatory past negative

text: セカンドインパクトがあったからな
translation: Because there was Second Impact
grammar: からな - masculine casual explanatory particle (because, you know)

text: えぇ!?
translation: What!?
grammar: Extended vowel え elongated for emphasis and surprise

text: 修学旅行に行っちゃダメ!? / さ、どうして? / 戦闘待機だもの。 / そんなの聞いてないわよ! / 今言ったわ。 / 誰が決めたのよ!
translation: I can't go on the school trip!? / Why? / You're on combat standby. / I never heard that! / I just told you. / Who decided that!?
grammar: ちゃダメ - contraction of てはダメ (must not); だもの - explanatory particle; 聞いてない - haven't heard; のよ - feminine emphatic particle

text: 作戦担当のあたしが決めたの。
translation: I, the operations officer, decided it.
grammar: の - nominalizer emphasizing the subject; が - subject marker emphasizing who did it

text: あんた、お茶なんかすすってないで、ちょっとなんか言ってやったらどうなの? / 男でしょ!
translation: You, instead of sipping tea, why don't you say something to her? / You're a man, aren't you!
grammar: なんか - dismissive particle (something like); ないで - without doing; 言ってやる - to say (for someone's benefit); でしょ - isn't it?, right?

text: だ、僕はたぶんこういうことになるんじゃないかと思って。 / 諦めてたってわけ?
translation: I-I thought this was probably how it would turn out. / You mean you had given up?

vocabulary.meaning: to give up, to resign oneself

grammar: んじゃないかと思って - thought that it would probably; てた - past progressive; ってわけ? - you mean to say?

text: ふっ情けない / 飼い慣らされた男なんて最低 / そういう言い方はやめてよ
translation: Hmph, pathetic / A tamed man is the worst / Stop talking like that
grammar: 飼い慣らされた - passive past tense (been tamed); なんて - dismissive particle; やめてよ - please stop (request with よ)

text: 気持ちはわかるけど / こればっかりは仕方ないわ
translation: I understand how you feel, but / There's nothing we can do about this
grammar: けど - but (casual); ばっかりは - specifically this (and nothing else); 仕方ない - unavoidable situation

text: あなたたちが修学旅行に行っている間に / 使徒の攻撃があるかもしれないでしょ
translation: While you're on the school trip / There might be an Angel attack, you know
grammar: ている間に - while doing; かもしれない - might, possibly; でしょ - you know, right? (seeking agreement)

text: いつもいつも大器大器大器大器
translation: Always, always waiting, waiting, waiting, waiting
grammar: Repetition of 待機 (たいき) four times for emphasis and frustration

text: いつ来るかわかんない敵を相手に守ることばっかし / たまには敵の居場所を突き止めて攻めに行ったらどうなの
translation: We're always just defending against an enemy that could come at any time / Why don't we track down the enemy's location and go on the offensive for once?

vocabulary.meaning: to attack, to go on offensive

grammar: かわかんない - casual for かわからない (don't know when); ばっかし - emphatic variant of ばっかり (only/just); たまには - once in a while; どうなの - what about it?

text: それができればやってるわよ / ま、二人ともこれをいい機会だと思わなきゃ / クラスのみんなが修学旅行に行ってる間
translation: If we could do that, we would be doing it / Well, you two should think of this as a good opportunity / While everyone in class is on the school trip
grammar: できれば - if possible; やってる - doing (contracted); わよ - emphatic feminine particle; 思わなきゃ - must think (contracted from 思わなければ)

text: 少しは勉強ができるでしょ / 私が知らないとでも思ってるの
translation: You'll be able to study a bit, won't you? / Do you think I don't know?
grammar: 少しは - at least a little; できるでしょ - can do, right?; とでも思ってるの - do you even think that...?

text: 見せなきゃバレないと思ったら大間違いよ / あなたたちが学校のテストで何点取ったかなんて情報ぐらい / 筒抜けなんだから / バカみたい / 学校の成績が何よ
translation: If you thought you wouldn't get caught by not showing it, you're dead wrong / Information like what scores you got on your school tests / Is completely transparent to us / How stupid / Who cares about school grades?

vocabulary.meaning: to be found out, to be exposed

grammar: 見せなきゃバレない - if you don't show, won't get caught; 思ったら - if you thought; なんて - such as, like; ぐらい - about, approximately; なんだから - because (explanatory); みたい - like, seems; 何よ - what (is it)? (dismissive)

text: 急退前とした限定式のテストなんか何の興味もないわ / 強にいれば強に従え
translation: I have no interest in limited-format tests from backward regions / When in Rome, do as the Romans do
grammar: なんか - dismissive particle (things like); 何の...もない - no... whatsoever; 郷に入れば郷に従え - Japanese proverb equivalent to 'When in Rome...'

text: 日本の学校にも慣れてちょうだ / いー / った
translation: Get used to Japanese schools too / Ugh / Ow

vocabulary.meaning: to get used to, to become accustomed

grammar: てちょうだ - please do (feminine command); いー - prolonged sound of annoyance; った - sound of pain

text: アスカお土産買ってくるからね
translation: Asuka, I'll buy you a souvenir, okay?
grammar: てくる - to do and come back; からね - because/so (soft reminder or promise)

text: ああ二人とも残念だったな / お前らの分まで楽しんできたるわ / なははははは
translation: Ah, too bad for you two / I'll enjoy it enough for your share too / Hahahaha
grammar: だったな - was, wasn't it; お前ら - you guys (plural, rough); まで - even, as far as; てきたる - Kansai dialect for てくる (will do and come)

text: 浅間山の観測データは / 下級的速やかにバルタザールからメルキオールへペーストしてください
translation: The observation data from Mt. Asama / Please paste it from Balthasar to Melchior as quickly as possible in descending order
grammar: てください - please do (polite request); バルタザール/メルキオール - names of MAGI supercomputers

text: 中学旅行? / こんなご時世にのんきなものね
translation: Middle school trip? / How carefree in times like these
grammar: こんな - such, like this; ご時世 - the current times (formal); ものね - it is indeed (feminine agreement)

text: こんなご時世だからこそ遊べるときに遊びたいのよ / あの子たち
translation: It's precisely because of times like these that they want to play when they can / Those kids
grammar: だからこそ - precisely because; 遊べるときに - when they can play; 遊びたい - want to play; のよ - explanatory feminine particle

text: 何してんの? / 理科の勉強
translation: What are you doing? / Studying science
grammar: してんの - contracted form of しているの (doing); 理科の勉強 - noun phrase (science study)

text: ったくお利口さんなんだから / そんなこと言ったってやらなきゃいけないんだから / じゃーん
translation: Geez, you're such a good student / Even if you say that, I have to do it / Ta-da!

vocabulary.meaning: geez, good grief (contraction of まったく)

grammar: なんだから - because (you) are; 言ったって - even if you say; やらなきゃいけない - must do; じゃーん - sound effect for revealing something

text: 沖縄でスクーバーできないんだからここで潜るの / そう / どれどれ何やってんの / ちょっと見せて
translation: Since I can't scuba in Okinawa, I'm diving here / I see / Now let's see what you're doing / Show me a bit
grammar: できないんだから - because/since can't do; ここで - here, in this place; どれどれ - now let me see; やってんの - what are you doing (contracted)

text: この程度の数式が解けないの?
translation: You can't solve equations of this level?
grammar: この程度の - of this level; 解けない - cannot solve (potential negative); の - questioning particle (with rising intonation)

text: はい、できた / 簡単じゃん / どうしてこんな難しいのができて / 学校のテストがダメなの?
translation: There, done! / That's easy! / How can you solve such difficult problems / but fail school tests?
grammar: どうして...の? - 'why/how...?' question pattern; ~ができて - 'can do ~' (potential form with て-form connecting clauses)

text: 問題に何が書いてあるのか分かんなかったのよ / それって日本語の説問が読めなかったってこと? / そう、まだ漢字全部覚えてないのよね
translation: I didn't understand what was written in the questions. / You mean you couldn't read the Japanese questions? / Right, I still haven't memorized all the kanji yet.
grammar: ~のか分かんなかった - casual 'didn't know/understand ~' (分からなかった); ~ってこと? - 'you mean...?' confirmation pattern; まだ~ていない - 'haven't yet ~'

text: 向こうの大学じゃ習ってなかったし / 大学? / ああ、去年卒業したの / え?こっちのこれはなんて書いてあんの?
translation: They didn't teach that at university back there. / University? / Yeah, I graduated last year. / Huh? What does this one say?
grammar: ~じゃ習ってなかった - 'wasn't taught at ~' (じゃ = では); ~したの - explanatory/confirmation の; ~って書いてある - 'it says/is written ~'

text: 熱膨張に関する問題だよ / 熱膨張?幼稚なことやってんのね
translation: It's a problem about thermal expansion. / Thermal expansion? You're studying such childish things.
grammar: ~に関する - 'relating to ~'; ~やってんのね - casual form of やっているのね 'doing ~, huh'

text: ドドのつまり物っての温めれば膨らんで大きくなるし / 冷やせば縮んで小さくなるってことじゃない / そりゃそうだけど
translation: Basically, if you heat things up they expand and get bigger, / and if you cool them down they contract and get smaller, right? / Well, yeah, but...
grammar: どどのつまり - 'in the end, basically'; ~ば - conditional 'if'; ~って - quotation marker; ~ってことじゃない - 'isn't it the case that...?'

text: 私の場合胸だけ温めれば少しはおっぱいが大きくなるのかな
translation: In my case, I wonder if heating just my chest would make my breasts get a little bigger?
grammar: ~の場合 - 'in the case of ~'; ~ば - conditional 'if'; ~のかな - 'I wonder if ~' (uncertain/wondering tone)

text: そんなこと聞かれたってわかんないよ / つまんない男 / ここ?
translation: I don't know even if you ask me something like that! / You're such a boring guy. / Here?
grammar: ~たって - 'even if ~'; わかんない - casual form of わからない 'don't know'

text: 見て見て!シンジ! / ん? / バックロールエントリー!
translation: Look, look! Shinji! / Hm? / Back roll entry!
grammar: 見て見て - repetition for emphasis 'look, look!'; バックロールエントリー - English loanword for scuba diving technique

text: これではよくわからんな / しかし浅間山地震研究所の報告通り / この影は気になります / もちろん無視はできん / マギの判断は? / フィフティーフィフティーです
translation: I can't really tell from this. / However, just as the Asama Earthquake Research Institute reported, / this shadow concerns me. / Of course we can't ignore it. / What's MAGI's judgment? / Fifty-fifty.
grammar: よくわからん - casual/masculine negative form of よくわからない; ~通り - 'just as ~, according to ~'; 気になる - 'to be bothered/concerned about'

text: 現地へは? / すでに、葛城一位が到着しています
translation: What about on site? / Captain Katsuragi has already arrived.
grammar: すでに - 'already'; ~ています - continuous/completed state

text: もう限界です / いえ、あと500をお願いします
translation: We're at the limit already. / No, please go another 500.
grammar: もう - 'already'; あと~ - 'another ~, ~ more'

text: 震度1200、耐圧隔壁に亀裂発生 / 葛城さん!
translation: Depth 1200, crack forming in pressure bulkhead! / Katsuragi-san!
grammar: ~に - location particle 'in/at ~'; 発生 - noun used as verb with する

text: 壊れたら、うちで弁償します。あと200
translation: If it breaks, we'll compensate you. 200 more.
grammar: ~たら - conditional 'if ~'; うちで - 'on our part, we will'

text: ソニターに反応!
translation: Response on sonar!
grammar: ~に反応 - 'response/reaction on ~'

text: 解析開始! / はい!
translation: Begin analysis! / Yes!
grammar: Noun + する verb used in command form without する (解析開始 instead of 解析を開始する)

text: 観測機悪回!爆発しました!
translation: Observation equipment failure! It exploded!
grammar: ~しました - polite past tense

text: 解析は? / ギリギリで間に合いましたね。パターン青です。
translation: The analysis? / We just barely made it. It's pattern blue.

vocabulary.meaning: to be in time, to make it

grammar: ~で間に合う - 'made it with/by ~'; ~ね - confirmation/agreement particle

text: 間違いない。使徒だわ。 / これより、当研究所は完全閉鎖! / NERVの管轄下となります。
translation: No mistake. It's an Angel. / From this point, this research institute is completely sealed! / It will come under NERV's jurisdiction.
grammar: 間違いない - 'no mistake, certain'; ~だわ - feminine assertion; これより - 'from now, from this point'; ~となる - 'to become ~'

text: 一切の入室を禁じた上、過去6時間以内の事象は全て無害費とします。
translation: All entry is forbidden, and furthermore, all events within the past 6 hours will be classified.
grammar: ~た上 - 'after doing ~, furthermore'; ~以内 - 'within ~'; ~とする - 'to decide/declare as ~'

text: 怒り司令宛にA17を要請して、大支給。 / 気 / をつけてください。これは通常回線です。 / わか / っているわ。さっさと手比回線に切り替えて。
translation: Request A-17 to Commander Ikari, highest priority. / Be / careful. This is a normal line. / I / know that. Hurry and switch to a secure line.
grammar: ~宛に - 'addressed to ~'; 気をつける - 'be careful'; さっさと - 'hurry up, quickly'

text: 17?こちらから撃っててるのか?そうです。 / ダメだ、 / 危険すぎる。15年前を忘れたとは言わせんぞ。
translation: A-17? You're attacking from our side? That's right. / No good. / Too dangerous. I won't let you say you've forgotten what happened 15 years ago.
grammar: ~すぎる - 'too ~'; ~たとは言わせない - 'won't let you say that ~'; ~んぞ - emphatic masculine prohibition

text: これはチャンスなのです。これまで防戦一方だった我々が初めて攻勢に出るため。 / リスクが大きすぎるな。
translation: This is our chance. For us, who have only been on the defensive until now, to go on the offensive for the first time. / The risk is too great.
grammar: これまで - 'until now'; ~一方 - 'only ~, one-sided'; ~に出る - 'to go into/take ~'; ~ため - 'in order to ~'

text: しかし、生きた使徒のサンプル、その重要性はすでに生じのことでしょう。 / 失敗は許さん。
translation: However, a living Angel sample - you already understand its importance. / I will not permit failure.
grammar: ~のこと - 'matter of ~'; ~でしょう - 'probably, I assume'; 許さん - masculine negative 'will not permit'

text: 失敗か。その時は人類そのものが消えてしまうよ。本当にいいんだな。
translation: Failure? At that point, humanity itself will disappear. Are you really sure this is okay?
grammar: その時は - 'at that time, in that case'; ~てしまう - completion/regrettable result; ~んだな - confirmation 'right?, isn't it?'

text: これが使徒? / そうよ。まだ完成体になっていないさなぎの状態みたいなものね。
translation: This is the Angel? / That's right. It's like it's still in a chrysalis state, not yet a complete form.
grammar: ~になっていない - 'hasn't become ~'; ~みたいなもの - 'something like ~, kind of like ~'

text: 今回の作戦は使徒の捕獲を最優先とします。 / 出来うる限り原型をとどめ、生きたまま回収すること。 / できなかった時は?
translation: This operation prioritizes capturing the Angel above all else. / Preserve its original form as much as possible and recover it alive. / What if we can't?
grammar: ~を~とする - 'to make ~ as ~'; 出来うる限り - 'as much as possible'; ~たまま - 'while still ~, remaining ~'; ~こと - nominalizer for instructions

text: 即時殲滅。いいわね。 / はい! / 作戦担当者は? / はいはい! / 私が潜る!
translation: Immediate annihilation. Got it? / Yes! / Who's the operation officer? / Me, me! / I'll dive!
grammar: いいわね - feminine confirmation 'okay?, got it?'; はいはい - emphatic/eager response

text: でも、また僕なんだろうな。 / アスカ。
translation: But it'll be me again, won't it? / Asuka.
grammar: ~なんだろうな - 'I suppose it's ~, isn't it?' (resigned/expectant tone)

text: 2号機で担当して。 / はーい!こんなの楽勝じゃん! / 私は… / プロトタイプの05機には特殊装備は規格外なのよ
translation: You'll take Unit-02. / Yay! This is a piece of cake! / What about me...? / The special equipment is incompatible with the prototype Unit-00.
grammar: ~で担当する - 'to be in charge with ~'; こんなの - 'something like this'; ~じゃん - casual assertion 'isn't it, right?'

text: レイト05機は本部での待機を命じます / はい / 残念だったわね! / 温泉行けなくって
translation: Rei, I order Unit-00 to stand by at headquarters. / Yes. / Too bad for you! / That you can't go to the hot spring.
grammar: ~での待機 - 'standby at ~'; ~を命じる - 'to order ~'; ~だったわね - feminine past tense with confirmation; ~行けなくって - 'can't go' (て-form used conversationally)

text: A17が発令された以上、すぐに出るわよ / 支度して / はい!
translation: Now that A-17 has been issued, we're leaving immediately. / Get ready. / Yes!
grammar: ~された以上 - 'now that ~ has been done'; すぐに - 'immediately'; 支度して - command form of 支度する

text: 耐熱仕様のプラグスーツといっても、いつものと変わらないじゃない / 右のスイッチを押してみて
translation: Even though they say it's a heat-resistant plug suit, it doesn't look any different from usual. / Try pushing the switch on the right.
grammar: ~といっても - 'even though they say ~, although ~'; ~と変わらない - 'no different from ~'; ~てみて - 'try doing ~'

text: うわー、いやー! / なによこれー!
translation: Uwaa, no! / What is this?!
grammar: なによこれ - casual/emotional 'what is this?!'

text: 2号機の支度もできてるわ / いやー!な / によー、これー!
translation: Unit-02 is ready too. / No! Wha / t is this?!
grammar: ~もできている - 'is also ready/done'; elongated vowels (いやー、なによー) show emotional distress

text: 耐熱、耐圧、耐核防護服 / 極地戦用のD型装備よ
translation: Heat-resistant, pressure-resistant, nuclear-resistant protective suit. / It's Type-D equipment for polar region combat.
grammar: 連用形 listing (耐熱、耐圧、耐核) - multiple adjectives in sequence; ~用の - 'for the purpose of ~'

text: これがあたしの、2号機?
translation: This is my... Unit-02?
grammar: Pause before final word shows hesitation/disbelief

text: いやだ!あたし降りる! / こんなので人前に出たくないわ
translation: No way! I'm getting out! / I don't want to appear in front of people looking like this!

vocabulary.meaning: in front of people, in public

grammar: いやだ - emphatic refusal 'no way!'; こんなので - 'looking like this, in this state'; ~たくない - 'don't want to ~'

text: こういうのはシンジの方がお似合いよ / そいつは残念だな
translation: This kind of thing suits Shinji better. / That's too bad.
grammar: ~の方が - 'more than ~, ~ is better'; お似合い - honorific form of 似合う; そいつは - casual 'that'

text: アスカの勇姿が見れると思ってたんだけどな
translation: I was thinking I'd get to see Asuka's gallant figure though.
grammar: 見れる - potential form 'can see' (colloquial for 見られる); ~と思ってた - 'was thinking that ~'; ~んだけどな - regretful/disappointed tone

text: でもこんなダサいの来て / カジさんの前に出る勇気なんてないわ / 困りましたね / そうね
translation: But wearing something this uncool, / I don't have the courage to appear in front of Kaji-san. / This is a problem. / Indeed.
grammar: ~来て - te-form of 着る 'to wear'; ~なんてない - 'don't have something like ~'; 困りましたね - polite past tense expressing problem

text: あの僕が / 私が2号機で出るわ
translation: Um, I'll... / I'll go out in Unit-02.
grammar: あの - hesitation marker 'um, uh'; ~で出る - 'to go out in/with ~'

text: あなたには私の2号機に触ってほしくないの / 悪いけど、ファーストが出るくらいなら私が行くわ
translation: I don't want you touching my Unit-02. / Sorry, but if it's between the First going out, I'll go myself.
grammar: ~てほしくない - 'don't want (someone) to ~'; ~の - explanatory particle; ~くらいなら - 'if it comes to ~, rather than ~'

text: カッコ悪いけど、我慢してね
translation: It's uncool, but bear with it, okay?
grammar: ~けど - 'but'; 我慢してね - 'please endure/bear with it' (ね adds softness)

text: うわー、いやー! / なによこれー!
translation: Uwaa, no way! / What is this!?
grammar: Exclamatory expressions with elongated vowels for emphasis

text: 2号機の支度もできてるわ / いやー!な / によー、これー!
translation: Unit-02 is ready too. / Nooo! What is this!?

vocabulary.meaning: to be ready, to be completed

grammar: ~てる (contracted ~ている) indicates completed state

text: 耐熱、耐圧、耐核防護服 / 極地戦用のD型装備よ
translation: Heat-resistant, pressure-resistant, nuclear-resistant protective suit. It's Type-D equipment for polar combat.
grammar: Noun compounds with 耐~ prefix meaning 'resistance to'

text: これがあたしの、2号機?
translation: This is my... Unit-02?
grammar: Pause indicated by comma shows hesitation/disbelief

text: いやだ!あたし降りる! / こんなので人前に出たくないわ
translation: I hate this! I'm getting out! / I don't want to appear in front of people like this.

vocabulary.meaning: I hate it, I don't want to
to get off, to step down
in front of people, in public

grammar: ~たくない expresses unwillingness/not wanting to do something

text: こういうのはシンジの方がお似合いよ / そいつは残念だな
translation: This kind of thing suits Shinji better. / That's too bad.
grammar: ~の方が comparative structure meaning 'more than'

text: アスカの勇姿が見れると思ってたんだけどな
translation: I thought I'd get to see Asuka's brave figure though.
grammar: ~と思ってた past progressive of thinking/expectation; ~けどな shows mild disappointment

text: でもこんなダサいの来て / カジさんの前に出る勇気なんてないわ / 困りましたね / そうね
translation: But wearing something this uncool... I don't have the courage to appear in front of Kaji-san. / This is troublesome. / Indeed.

vocabulary.meaning: to be troubled, to be in difficulty

grammar: ~なんて emphasizes dismissiveness; polite past ~ました in 困りましたね

text: あの僕が / 私が2号機で出るわ
translation: Um, I'll... / I'll go out in Unit-02.
grammar: Interruption shown by / mark; ~で出る 'to go out in/with'

text: あなたには私の2号機に触ってほしくないの / 悪いけど、ファーストが出るくらいなら私が行くわ
translation: I don't want you touching my Unit-02. / Sorry, but if the First is going out, I'd rather go myself.
grammar: ~てほしくない expresses not wanting someone to do something; ~くらいなら 'rather than'

text: カッコ悪いけど、我慢してね
translation: It's uncool, but bear with it, okay?
grammar: ~してね soft request/command form with ね for emphasis

text: エヴァ初号機および2号機到着しました
translation: Eva Unit-01 and Unit-02 have arrived.
grammar: Formal report style with ~しました completion marker

text: 容器はその場にて待機。レーザーの打ち込みとクレーンの準備を急いで。 / 了解。
translation: Containers stand by on site. Hurry with the laser insertion and crane preparation. / Roger.
grammar: ~にて formal particle 'at'; imperative ~急いで 'hurry'

text: あれ?カジさんは? / あのバカは来ないわよ。仕事ないもの。
translation: Huh? What about Kaji-san? / That idiot isn't coming. He has no work.
grammar: ~わよ feminine assertive ending; ~もの explains reason casually

text: チェ!せっかくカジさんにもいいとこ見せようと思ったのに。
translation: Tch! I was hoping to show off to Kaji-san too.
grammar: ~ようと思った expresses past intention; ~のに shows disappointment

text: A17の発令ね。それには / 原子さんの凍結も含まれているわ。 / お / 困りの方もさぞ多いでしょうな。 / な / ぜ止めなかったの?
translation: The A17 declaration, right? That includes freezing of assets too. / There must be many troubled people. / Why didn't you stop it?
grammar: ~も含まれている passive form showing inclusion; ~でしょうな formal conjecture

text: 理由がありませんよ。発令は正式なものです。
translation: There was no reason to. The declaration is official.
grammar: ~ありません polite negative; ~ものです assertive explanation

text: でもNERVの失敗は世界の破滅を意味するのよ。
translation: But NERV's failure means the destruction of the world.
grammar: ~を意味する 'to mean/signify something'; explanatory のよ

text: 彼らはそんなに傲慢ではありませんよ。
translation: They aren't that arrogant.
grammar: ~ではありません polite negative of だ/である

text: 何ですか?あれ? / UNの空軍が空中待機してるのよ。この作戦が終わるまでね。 / 手伝ってくれるの? / い / え、後始末よ。私たちが失敗した時のね。
translation: What's that? / The UN air force is on aerial standby until this operation ends. / Are they helping us? / No, cleanup. For when we fail.
grammar: ~している ongoing state; ~まで 'until'; ~時の possessive の with 時 'when/time'

text: どういうこと? / 首都をN2爆雷で熱処理するのよ。私たちごとね。 / ひどい! / そんな命令、誰が出すんですか? / 碇司令よ。
translation: What does that mean? / They'll heat-treat the capital with N2 mines. Us included. / That's terrible! / Who gives such an order? / Commander Ikari.
grammar: どういうこと 'what does that mean'; ~ごと 'together with/including'; ~んですか seeking explanation

text: レーザー、作業終了。 / 進路加工。 / D型装備、異常なし。 / 2号機、発進位置。 / 了解。 / アスカ。 / 準備はどう? / いつでもどうぞ。
translation: Laser, work complete. / Route processing. / Type-D equipment, no abnormalities. / Unit-02, launch position. / Roger. / Asuka. / How's your preparation? / Ready anytime.
grammar: Technical/military report style with noun phrases; いつでも 'anytime'; どうぞ 'please go ahead'

text: 発進。
translation: Launch.
grammar: Single word command/announcement

text: うわぁ、熱 / そう
translation: Uwaa, it's hot. / Indeed.
grammar: Exclamatory うわぁ; dropped い from 熱い in casual speech

text: 2号機、溶岩内に入ります / 見て見て、シンジ / ジャ / イアントストロークエントリー
translation: Unit-02, entering the lava. / Look, look, Shinji! / Giant Stroke Entry!
grammar: ~に入ります polite volitional 'will enter'; 見て見て repetition for emphasis

text: 現在、 / 深度170、進行速度20、各部問題なし。 / 視界はゼロ。何もわかんないわ。 / CTモニターに切り替えます。
translation: Currently, depth 170, advance speed 20, no problems in any section. / Visibility is zero. I can't see anything. / Switching to CT monitor.
grammar: Technical reporting style; わかんない colloquial contraction of わからない

text: これでも透明度120か。
translation: Even with this, transparency is only 120.
grammar: これでも 'even with this'; か rhetorical question marker showing assessment
Sequential numerical reporting

translation: 900, 950, 1000, 1020, safety sheet over.
grammar: Technical terminology; シート likely 'limit' (from English 'sheet')

text: 震度1300、目標予測地点です / アスカ、何か見える? / 反応なし、いないわ / 思 / ったより滞留が早いよね
translation: Depth 1300, target prediction point. / Asuka, can you see anything? / No response, it's not here. / The retention is faster than expected, right?
grammar: ~より 'than'; ~よね seeking confirmation

text: 目標の移動速度に誤差が生じています / 再計算、急いで / 作戦続行。再度進行よろしく。 / え?
translation: An error has occurred in the target's movement speed. / Recalculate, hurry! / Continue operation. Proceed again. / Eh?
grammar: ~に誤差が生じる 'error occurs in~'; ~よろしく 'please proceed with~'
Numerical reporting sequence

text: 第二循環パイプに亀裂発生。 / 震度1480。 / 限界震度オーバー。
translation: Crack occurring in secondary circulation pipe. / Depth 1480. / Limit depth exceeded.
grammar: ~に亀裂発生 'crack occurring in~'; technical emergency reporting

text: 目標とまだ接触していないわ。 / 続けて。 / アスカ、どう? / まだ持ちそう。
translation: Still haven't made contact with the target. / Continue. / Asuka, how is it? / I can still hold on.
grammar: ~していない negative progressive; ~そう appearance/likelihood; まだ 'still'

text: さっさと終わらせてシャワー浴びたい。 / 近くにいい温泉があるわ。終わったらいきましょう。もう少し頑張って。
translation: I want to finish this quickly and take a shower. / There's a good hot spring nearby. Let's go when we're done. Hang in there a bit more.

vocabulary.meaning: to do one's best, to persevere

grammar: ~たい want to; ~たら conditional 'when/if'; ~ましょう volitional 'let's'; ~て imperative encouragement

text: 限界深度、プラス120。
translation: Limit depth, plus 120.
grammar: Technical measurement reporting

text: EVA2号機、プログライフ喪失。限界深度、プラス200。 / 勝脇さん、もうこれ以上は、今 / 度は人が乗っているんですよ。
translation: EVA Unit-02, prog life lost. Limit depth, plus 200. / Katsuragi-san, any more than this... This time there's a person riding it.
grammar: ~んですよ explanatory emphasis showing concern; これ以上 'any more than this'

text: この作戦の責任者は私です。続けてください。
translation: I am the person in charge of this operation. Please continue.
grammar: ~は~です assertive statement; ~てください polite request/command

text: ミサトの言う通りよ。大丈夫、まだ行けるわ。
translation: Just as Misato says. It's okay, I can still go on.
grammar: ~の言う通り 'just as ~ says'; まだ 'still'; potential form 行ける 'can go'

text: 深度1780。目標予測修正地点です。
translation: Depth 1780. Target prediction correction point.
grammar: Technical reporting with ~です formal marker

text: いた。
translation: There it is.
grammar: Past tense いた used for discovery/realization 'found it'

text: 目標を映像で確認。 / 捕獲準備。
translation: Target confirmed on video. / Prepare for capture.
grammar: Command/report style with noun phrases

text: お互いに大流で流されているから、接触のチャンスは… / 一度しかないわよ / わかってる、任せて / 目標 / は接触まで、 / あと30
translation: Since we're both being carried by the large current, the chance for contact is... / Only once. / I know, leave it to me. / Until contact with target, 30 more.

vocabulary.meaning: to be swept away, to drift

grammar: ~ているから causal 'because'; ~しかない 'only'; ~て imperative 'leave it!'

text: 相対速度2.2、軸戦に乗ったわ
translation: Relative speed 2.2, on the axis line.

vocabulary.meaning: to get on, to align with

grammar: ~に乗った 'got on/aligned with'; technical navigation terminology

text: 電磁柵展開、問題なし / 目標、捕獲しました
translation: Electromagnetic cage deployed, no problems. / Target captured.
grammar: Report style with ~しました completion marker

text: ナイスアスカ
translation: Nice, Asuka!
grammar: English loanword used as praise

text: 捕獲作業終了 / これより浮上します
translation: Capture operation complete. / Now surfacing.
grammar: これより formal transition marker; ~します polite future action

text: アスカ大丈夫 / あったりまえよ / アンズルより産むがやすしってね / やっぱ楽勝じゃん
translation: Asuka, you okay? / Of course! / 'Giving birth is easier than worrying,' you know. / As expected, easy victory!
grammar: 案ずるより産むが易し proverb; やっぱ colloquial やはり; ~じゃん casual assertive

text: 第二循環パイプに亀裂発生。 / 震度1480。 / 限界震度オーバー。
translation: Cracks developing in the second circulation pipe. / Depth 1480. / Exceeding critical depth limit.
grammar: に (location particle) + 発生 (occurrence) - indicates where something is occurring

text: 目標とまだ接触していないわ。 / 続けて。 / アスカ、どう? / まだ持ちそう。
translation: We haven't made contact with the target yet. / Continue. / Asuka, how is it? / I can still hold on.
grammar: 〜ていない (negative progressive form) - indicates action has not yet occurred; 〜そう (auxiliary) - appears that/seems like

text: さっさと終わらせてシャワー浴びたい。 / 近くにいい温泉があるわ。終わったらいきましょう。もう少し頑張って。
translation: I want to finish this quickly and take a shower. / There's a nice hot spring nearby. Let's go when we're done. Hang in there a little longer.
grammar: 〜たい (desiderative) - expresses desire; 〜たら (conditional) - when/if; 〜て form (imperative) - command/request

text: 限界深度、プラス120。
translation: Critical depth, plus 120.
grammar: Technical measurement statement - noun + numeric value

text: EVA2号機、プログライフ喪失。限界深度、プラス200。 / 勝脇さん、もうこれ以上は、今 / 度は人が乗っているんですよ。
translation: EVA Unit 02, progressive knife lost. Critical depth, plus 200. / Katsuragi-san, we can't go any further, this time / there's a person riding in it.
grammar: 〜ている (progressive) - indicates ongoing state; これ以上 (no more than this) - expression of limit

text: この作戦の責任者は私です。続けてください。
translation: I am the person in charge of this operation. Please continue.
grammar: 〜です (copula) - formal statement of identity; 〜てください (polite request) - please do

text: ミサトの言う通りよ。大丈夫、まだ行けるわ。
translation: Just as Misato says. It's okay, I can still go.
grammar: 〜通り (just as, according to) - indicates conformity; 〜る/える potential form - expresses ability

text: 深度1780。目標予測修正地点です。
translation: Depth 1780. This is the revised target prediction point.
grammar: Compound noun construction - multiple nouns stacked to create technical term

text: いた。
translation: There it is.
grammar: Past tense た form of いる - sudden realization/discovery

text: 目標を映像で確認。 / 捕獲準備。
translation: Target confirmed on visual. / Prepare for capture.
grammar: を + で (particle combination) - object marker + method/means; Noun-only statements common in military/operational contexts

text: お互いに大流で流されているから、接触のチャンスは… / 一度しかないわよ / わかってる、任せて / 目標 / は接触まで、 / あと30
translation: We're both being carried by the current, so the chance for contact is... / Only once. / I know, leave it to me. / Target / until contact, / 30 more.
grammar: 〜ている (progressive) - ongoing action; 〜しかない (only) - exclusive limit; 〜て form (imperative) - casual command

text: 相対速度2.2、軸戦に乗ったわ
translation: Relative velocity 2.2, I'm on axis.
grammar: 〜た (past tense) - completed action; Technical/military terminology for alignment

text: 電磁柵展開、問題なし / 目標、捕獲しました
translation: Electromagnetic cage deployed, no problems. / Target captured.
grammar: 〜なし (without) - negative noun; 〜ました (polite past) - formal completion report

text: ナイスアスカ
translation: Nice, Asuka!
grammar: English loanword used as exclamation of approval

text: 捕獲作業終了 / これより浮上します
translation: Capture operation complete. / Now surfacing.
grammar: これより (from this point) - formal transition marker; 〜ます (polite form) - formal announcement

text: アスカ大丈夫 / あったりまえよ / アンズルより産むがやすしってね / やっぱ楽勝じゃん
translation: Asuka, are you okay? / Of course! / You know, giving birth is easier than worrying about it. / I knew it would be a piece of cake.

vocabulary.word: 案ずるより産むが易し
vocabulary.reading: あんずるよりうむがやすし
vocabulary.meaning: giving birth is easier than worrying (proverb)

grammar: 〜ってね (casual quotative) - you know; じゃん (casual copula) - casual assertion, typical of youth speech

text: でもこれじゃプラグスーツというよりサウナスーツよ
translation: But this is more like a sauna suit than a plug suit.
grammar: 〜というより (rather than) - comparison marker indicating one thing is more appropriate than another

text: はぁ早いとコーンセンに入りたい / 緊張がいっぺんに溶けたみたいね / そう / あなたも今日の作戦怖かったんでしょ
translation: I want to get in the hot spring quickly. / It seems like all your tension melted away at once, huh? / Yeah. / You were scared of today's operation too, weren't you?
grammar: 〜たい (desiderative) - want to; 〜みたい (resemblance) - seems like; 〜んでしょ (explanatory + presumption) - seeking confirmation

text: まあね、下手に手を出せば、あれの二の前ですものね / そうね、セカンドインパクト / 二度とごめんだわ
translation: Well yeah, if we handled it poorly, we'd end up just like that. / Right, Second Impact. / Never again.
grammar: 〜ば (conditional) - if; 〜ですもの (explanatory) - because/you see; だわ (feminine sentence ending)

text: なによこれ
translation: What the heck is this?
grammar: なによ (what + よ particle) - emphatic/annoyed question, feminine speech

text: まずいわ、ウッカを始めたのよ / 計算より早すぎるわ / キャッチャーは? / とても持ちません
translation: This is bad, it's started to hatch. / It's way too fast compared to our calculations. / What about the catcher? / It can't hold at all.
grammar: 〜始める (start doing) - auxiliary verb; 〜より (than) - comparison; 〜すぎる (too much) - excess

text: 捕獲中止、キャッチャ / ーを破棄 / くっ!
translation: Abort capture, discard the catcher. / Damn!
grammar: Noun-based commands common in emergency situations; くっ - interjection of frustration

text: 作戦変更!使徒殲滅を最優先!
translation: Change of operation! Angel annihilation is top priority!
grammar: 〜を (object marker) + 最優先 (top priority) - marking what receives priority status

text: 2号機は撤収作業しつつ、検討準備! / 待ってました!
translation: Unit 02, prepare for combat while withdrawing! / I've been waiting for this!
grammar: 〜しつつ (while doing) - simultaneous actions; 〜ました (polite past) - expresses completion/anticipation

text: しまった!ナイフは落としちゃったんだわ! / 正面! / ダラスト放出!
translation: Oh no! I dropped the knife! / Dead ahead! / Release ballast!
grammar: 〜ちゃった (casual past completion) - regretful completion; 〜んだわ (explanatory + feminine ending)

text: は、早 / い!
translation: It's f-fast!
grammar: Exclamatory い-adjective; stuttering indicated by splitting the word

text: おまけに視界は悪い、やたらと熱い、スーツがべったりしてて気持ち悪い、もう最低ね / アツカ?
translation: On top of that, visibility is bad, it's ridiculously hot, the suit is clinging and feels gross—this is the worst. / Asuka?
grammar: 〜てて (casual progressive) - casual form of ている; List of complaints connected with commas

text: 今のうちに初号機のナイフを落とすわ、受け取って、了解
translation: I'll drop Unit 01's knife while I can. Catch it. Roger.
grammar: 〜のうちに (while) - doing something during a limited time window; 〜て (imperative) - command form

text: やば、まだなの?ジンジー!
translation: Oh no, not yet? Shinji!
grammar: 〜なの (explanatory question) - feminine questioning; Elongated name (シンジー) shows urgency/distress

text: ナイフ到達まで、あと40 / 使徒急速接近中!
translation: 40 more until knife arrival. / Angel approaching rapidly!
grammar: 〜まで (until) - time limit marker; 〜中 (in progress) - ongoing action marker

text: いやー!来ないでー! / あー!早く来てー!
translation: Nooo! Don't come! / Ahh! Come quickly!
grammar: 〜ないで (negative request) - please don't; 〜て (request) - please do; Extended vowels (ー) show emotional distress

text: もう遅いー!
translation: It's too late!
grammar: もう + adjective emphasizes the state has been reached; ー elongates the vowel for emotional emphasis

text: しま / った!
translation: Oh no! / Damn it!

vocabulary.meaning: damn it, oh no (expression of regret)

grammar: Past tense of しまう in exclamatory form expressing regret or failure

text: まさかこの状況下で口を開くなんて信じられない構造ですね
translation: I can't believe it's a structure that can open its mouth under these conditions
grammar: なんて after verb emphasizes disbelief; 信じられない is potential negative form of 信じる

text: 左足装置を耐熱処置
translation: Heat-resistant treatment to the left leg equipment
grammar: を particle marks the object; compound technical terms common in military/technical contexts

text: ゴンチキショー
translation: Damn it! / Son of a...!

vocabulary.meaning: damn it, expletive (コンチクショー variant)

grammar: Emphatic expletive, variant pronunciation of コンチクショー (畜生)

text: 高温高圧 / これだけの極限状態に耐えてるのよ / プログナイフじゃダメだ / ではどうすれば / そうだ / さっきのやつ
translation: High temperature, high pressure / It's withstanding such extreme conditions / A prog knife won't work / Then what should we do? / I've got it! / That thing from before

vocabulary.reading: きょくげんじょうたい

grammar: これだけの emphasizes extent; ている shows ongoing state; じゃダメだ = では駄目だ (won't work); そうだ indicates realization

text: 炎!
translation: Fire!
grammar: Single noun exclamation indicating sudden realization

text: なるほど、熱膨張ね / 冷却液の圧力を全て3番に回して、早く!
translation: I see, thermal expansion / Redirect all the coolant pressure to number 3, quickly!
grammar: なるほど expresses understanding; 回して is te-form of 回す (to redirect); 早く is adverb urging speed

text: せっかくやったのに
translation: Even though I did all that...

vocabulary.meaning: with effort, going to the trouble

grammar: せっかく emphasizes effort put in; のに expresses disappointment that effort was wasted

text: やだな、ここまでなの
translation: No way, is this the end?

vocabulary.meaning: no, I don't want (casual form of 嫌だ)

grammar: やだな expresses reluctance/refusal; なの is feminine sentence ending particle seeking confirmation

text: シンジ
translation: Shinji
grammar: Simple name vocative expressing emotion

text: バカ、無理しちゃって
translation: You idiot, pushing yourself too hard
grammar: ちゃって is contraction of てしまって, expressing regret or completion with emotional nuance

text: ごめんください。メルフの人いますか? / はーい!
translation: Excuse me. Is anyone from NERV here? / Yes!
grammar: ごめんください is traditional greeting when entering someone's home; いますか asks if someone is present

text: では、ここにサインをお願いします。
translation: Then, please sign here.
grammar: を particle marks サイン as object of お願いします; polite request form

text: はい、どうもありがとうございました。 / カジさんから? / 何だろう?
translation: Yes, thank you very much. / From Kaji-san? / I wonder what it is?
grammar: ありがとうございました is past polite thanks; だろう expresses speculation/wondering

text: 風呂はそこは左だよ。
translation: The bath is over there to the left.
grammar: は marks topic; そこは indicates location; だよ is casual explanatory ending

text: 極楽極楽
translation: Pure bliss, pure bliss
grammar: Repetition for emphasis; common expression of comfort/pleasure, especially in baths

text: 風呂がこんなに気持ちいいなんて知らなかったな
translation: I didn't know baths could feel this good
grammar: なんて after clause expresses surprise or emphasis; な at end is reflective particle

text: シンジくん聞こえる?
translation: Shinji-kun, can you hear me?
grammar: 聞こえる is intransitive potential verb; rising intonation indicates question

text: はい! / ボディシャンプー投げてくれる? / 持ってきたのなくなっちゃった
translation: Yes! / Can you throw me the body shampoo? / The one I brought ran out
grammar: てくれる requests favor; ちゃった is contraction of てしまった expressing completion with regret

text: 行くよ / 了解
translation: Here it comes / Got it
grammar: 行くよ announces action about to happen; よ adds emphasis/alertness

text: いった! / バカね、どこ投げてんのよ、へたくそ! / あ、ごめん。 / もう、変なとこに当てないで / よね。 / どれどれ? / あ、あ、あ!
translation: Ow! / You idiot, where are you throwing it, you're terrible! / Ah, sorry. / Don't hit me in weird places! / Let me see? / Ah, ah, ah!
grammar: てんの is contraction of ているの (what are you doing); ないで is negative te-form requesting someone not to do something

text: あは、アスカの肌って、すっごく、ふくしてた面白いね。 / やだ、くすぐったい。 / じゃあ、ここよ。 / あはは、そんなとこ触らないでよ。
translation: Ah ha, Asuka's skin is really swollen, it's funny. / No, it tickles. / Then here. / Ahaha, don't touch me there!
grammar: って is topic particle; 面白いね seeks agreement; やだ is casual refusal; ないでよ is casual negative request with よ for emphasis

text: いいじゃな、ヘルモンじゃないし。
translation: It's fine, isn't it? We're not strangers.
grammar: じゃない seeks agreement; し at end gives reason; ヘルモン appears to be playful pronunciation

text: 膨張してしまった。 / 恥ずかしい。
translation: It expanded. / How embarrassing.
grammar: てしまった expresses regrettable completion or unintended result

text: これね / セカンドインパクトの時ちょっちね
translation: This one / From the time of Second Impact

vocabulary.meaning: a little bit (casual ちょっと)

grammar: ね is explanatory particle; の時 indicates 'at the time of'

text: 知ってるんでしょ / 私のこともみんな / ま、仕事だからね
translation: You know, don't you? / Everything about me too / Well, it's work after all
grammar: んでしょ is contraction of のでしょう seeking confirmation; だからね gives reason

text: お互いもう昔のことだもの / 気にすることないわ
translation: For both of us, it's all in the past / There's nothing to worry about
grammar: だもの explains reason; ことない expresses 'no need to'; わ is feminine ending particle

text: ご視聴ありがとうございました
translation: Thank you for watching

vocabulary.word: ありがとうございました
vocabulary.reading: ありがとうございました

grammar: ご + noun shows respect; ました is polite past form; standard end-of-show message

text: NELFを心よく思わない人々が第三神道教師全 / ての電源を止める / 近代設備が何も動かないNELFに使徒が迫る
translation: People who don't think well of NERV cut all the power to Tokyo-3 / An Angel approaches NERV where none of the modern equipment works

vocabulary.reading: こころよくおもわない
vocabulary.meaning: don't think well of, harbor ill will

grammar: を思わない is negative form; 近代設備が何も動かない modifies NERV; に marks direction

text: 次回、静止した闇の中で、この次もサービスしちゃうわよ!
translation: Next episode: In the Still Darkness. I'll give you service next time too!
grammar: した modifies 闇; の中で = in/within; ちゃう is casual contraction of てしまう; わよ is emphatic feminine ending
